import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; // eslint-disable-next-line import Product from '../components/Product'; import Rating from '../components/Rating'; import data from '../data'; export default function ProductScreen(props){ const product = data.products.find((x) => x._id === props.match.params.id); if(!product){ return
Product Not Found
} return (
Back to result

  • {product.name}

  • Price: ${product.price}
  • Description:

    {product.description}

  • Status
